channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Fashionably In Love
channel.desc: Oliver needs to fix his player reputation and Avery needs access to his fashion designer friend, so dating each other is simply a smart business decision. Or is it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Flowers And Honey
channel.desc: Love begins to bloom between florist Sarah and beekeeper Hank after Sarah inherits her great aunt's farmland.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Our Take On Love
channel.desc: When fashion designer Isabella and filmmaker Blake work together to capture a love story from the past, they start to find romance in their present too.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Missed Connection
channel.desc: Five years after finding a spark with a stranger on a train platform, a photographer finds himself seated next to the same woman on a plane heading to the same wedding - hers.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love On The Right Course
channel.desc: After suffering a series of setbacks, a professional golfer returns home to Budapest to reflect on her future in the sport. There, she meets a man who helps her rediscover herself.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sweet As Pie
channel.desc: When Tamara visits her family's apple orchard, she reconnects with her childhood best friend and together they fight - armed with pastry and passion - to keep the orchard alive.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Aloha Heart
channel.desc: Sara travels to Hawaii for her best friend's wedding, but instead of enjoying a relaxing holiday, she finds herself helping the new manager make changes to his family hotel.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Crimetime
channel.desc: A crime series actress returns to her home town where she encounters her first real case. Can her TV crime knowledge save the day? Mystery drama with Lyndie Greenwood.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Love In The Limelight
channel.desc: Pen pals with Nick for years, Summer is reluctant for her relationship with him to go public when the former boy band singer comes to town for a comeback concert.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Real West
channel.desc: Sparks fly between recently widowed Rebecca and ranch hand Jake, who works at the property she goes to on holiday. But is Jake's availability a worrying factor in their relationship.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Attraction Test
channel.desc: After being called out during the launch of her landmark study on love, an acclaimed professor is forced to take her own dating test with the man who criticised it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Aurora Teagarden Mysteries:...
channel.desc: A young woman returns home to pursue her post-graduate degree but finds herself embroiled in a mystery involving her friend's fianc?. Mystery thriller.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Professional Bridesmaid....
channel.desc: When a professional bridesmaid books a high-profile wedding, she must keep her identity a secret not just from the guests, but also from the handsome reporter covering the event.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Royal-ish
channel.desc: Theme Park performer Lacey becomes friends with eight-year-old princess Rose and is swept up in the royal world of luxury and nobility. Nichole Sakura stars.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Paris Proposal
channel.desc: When two colleagues are mistaken for a couple, they must keep up appearances to not disappoint their biggest client. But could their little white lie turn into something more.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Luckless In Love
channel.desc: A blogger is offered her own column after her post about a terrible date goes viral. But there's a catch - to keep writing good content, she needs to keep seeing the bad date.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Moriah's Lighthouse
channel.desc: Artisan Moriah dreams of restoring a lighthouse in her French seaside town, but then American architect Ben arrives and threatens to derail her plans.
